meta.title: Retrui - Personal News Portal
meta.description: Aggregate news feeds from around the world in one place. TechCrunch, BBC, The Verge and more. Build your own custom news aggregator.
meta.keywords: news portal, news aggregator, personalized news, tech news, world news, RSS reader

about.title: ABOUT RETRUI
about.intro: Retrui is a modern, retro-styled news aggregator that brings you the latest news from multiple trusted sources. Built with a beautiful nostalgic interface and cutting-edge web technologies.
about.dataCollectionDesc: RSS Feed Aggregation: Retrui aggregates news from 175+ trusted RSS feeds in real-time across 8 categories.
about.serverDatabaseDesc: News are stored in our database for 5 days. Articles older than 5 days are automatically deleted to keep the content fresh and relevant.
about.fiveDayRetentionDesc: We keep news for 5 days only. Older articles are automatically cleaned up to ensure you always see the most current news.
about.realTimeUpdatesDesc: News feeds are synchronized every 8 hours via automated cron jobs, ensuring you have access to the latest headlines.
about.autoCleanupDesc: Articles older than 5 days are automatically removed from our database to maintain optimal performance and freshness.
about.offlineSupport: Offline Support: Cached content remains available even when offline.
about.privacy: Privacy: Your reading history and cached data stay on your device. We do not track individual reading behavior.
about.openSource: Retrui is open source and available on GitHub.
about.builtWith: Built with ❤️ using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
